definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
Yulong Naxi autonomous county in Lijiang 麗江|丽江[Li4 jiang1], Yunnan
pinyin: Yu4 long2 Na4 xi1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

definition: Lijiang Naxi Autonomous County in Yunnan
pinyin: Li4 jiang1 Na4 xi1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

sentences.english: Morning, drive to Lijiang, the cultural center of the Naxi Minority.
sentences.chinese: 早上，乘車至麗江，這裏是納西族的文化中心。

sentences.english: Pray for Naxi believers to stand on God our Rock.
sentences.chinese: 願納西族基督徒站穩在我們的上帝磐石上。
右邊的這位是納西族的母神。

sentences.english: This paper introduce the formation and characteristics of Naxizu costumes and adornments .
sentences.chinese: 介紹了麗江地區納西族民俗服飾的形成及其特點。

sentences.english: Oh, they are actually Naxi friends.
sentences.chinese: 哦，原來都是納西族的朋友。

sentences.english: Naxi people regard tea as their livelihood.
sentences.chinese: 納西族把茶葉看做生活。

sentences.english: Naxi girl under veneering Xingyue beautiful hair, walked the rows.
sentences.chinese: 納西族少女披着鑲飾星月的美麗披肩，一排排的走着。

sentences.english: The brewing method of fight between dragon and tiger tea is also very special.
sentences.chinese: 納西族喝的“龍虎鬥”，製作方法也很奇特。

sentences.english: The ancient traditional culture of the Naxi ethnic group is the Dongba culture which is based on the Dongba religion.
sentences.chinese: 對納西族古老的傳統文化是東巴文化，以東巴教。

sentences.english: The culture denotes the old traditional cultures of the Naxi Nationality, is "The Dongba Culture".
sentences.chinese: 麗江納西族的古代傳統文化，就是“東巴文化”。

sentences.english: The sheepskin cape is the cream of traditional clothing culture of Naxi nationality.
sentences.chinese: 納西族女性羊皮披肩是納西族傳統服飾中的精華。

sentences.english: The sheepskin cape is the cream of traditional clothing culture of Naxi nationality.
sentences.chinese: 納西族女性羊皮披肩是納西族傳統服飾中的精華。

sentences.english: This Naxi tradition is really commendable.
sentences.chinese: 納西族的這個傳統真了不起。

definition: Tonggu county in Yichun 宜春, Jiangxi
Paiwan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
old tea-horse road or southern Silk Road, dating back to 6th century, from Tibet and Sichuan through Yunnan and Southeast Asia, reaching to Bhutan, Sikkim, India and beyond
Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
Gongshan Derung and Nu autonomous county in Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州[Nu4 jiang1 Li4 su4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1] in northwest Yunnan
to go sightseeing/to spend one's leisure time wandering around
Great stone bridge or Dashiqiao county level city in Yingkou 營口|营口, Liaoning
